casebody.data:
LAKEMPER
v.
BECK. No. 86P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Beck.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of February 2007 by Defendant to Proceed as Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
